Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 33rd overall pick, by Capital City in 1970...
Injured on 4/26/1984 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 7-8 weeks...
Drove in 7 runs against Diablo on 8/15/1984...
Signed as a free agent by Gashouse on 2/26/1985 to a 3-year deal worth $9,846,000 per year...
Had 2000th career hit on 8/17/1986, off Robert Gass (CI)...
